tool_description: Delivers notifications to customers through multiple channels including email, SMS, push notifications, and in-app messages based on customer preferences.

send_immediately.description: Whether to send immediately or queue for optimal timing

error_messages: Invalid notification channels: Use supported channels [email, sms, push, in_app].
Customer not found: The specified customer_id doesn't exist.
Missing contact information: Customer doesn't have contact info for requested channels.
Message too long: Message body exceeds maximum length for SMS channel.
Delivery failed: Unable to deliver notification through any specified channel.
Rate limit exceeded: Too many notifications sent to this customer recently.
usage: Provide customer_id, notification_channels array, subject_line, message_body, and urgency_level. Optionally include tracking_url and send_immediately flag.

delivery_status.description: Overall delivery status (sent, queued, failed, partial)

successful_channels.description: Channels that successfully delivered the notification

failed_channels.description: Channels that failed to deliver the notification
